CustomProperties.Name: SelectRange
CustomProperties.Tooltip: True if selecting a date range and false for a single date

CustomProperties.Name: BorderRadius
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Border radius of the calendar selections

Children.Name: btnDayBack
ControlPropertyState:
@{InvariantPropertyName=Color; AutoRuleBindingEnabled=False; AutoRuleBindingString=If(DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,Days)=_selectedStart || DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,Days)=_selectedEnd,
        Calendar.SelectedDateColor,
    DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,Days)=_today || Month(DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,Days))=Month(_firstDayOfMonth),
        Black,
    ColorFade(Black,60%)); NameMapSourceSchema=?; IsLockable=False; AFDDataSourceName=}

@{InvariantPropertyName=Fill; AutoRuleBindingEnabled=False; AutoRuleBindingString=If(DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,Days) = _selectedStart || DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,Days) =_selectedEnd,
    Calendar.SelectedFill,
    DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,Days) > _selectedStart && DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,Days) < _selectedEnd,
    LightBlue,
DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,Days) =_today, 
    RGBA(0,0,0,0.1), 
// default
    RGBA(0,0,0,0)); NameMapSourceSchema=?; IsLockable=False; AFDDataSourceName=}

Children.Name: btnDayValue
Rules:
@{Property=DisplayMode; Category=Design; InvariantScript=If(
    DateAdd(
        _firstDayInView,
        ThisItem.Value,
        TimeUnit.Days
    ) < Today() || DateAdd(
        _firstDayInView,
        ThisItem.Value,
        TimeUnit.Days
    ) > DateAdd(
        Today(),
        Calendar.DaysAheadRestriction,
        TimeUnit.Days
    ),
    DisplayMode.Disabled,
    DisplayMode.Edit
); RuleProviderType=Unknown}
ControlPropertyState:
@{InvariantPropertyName=Fill; AutoRuleBindingEnabled=False; AutoRuleBindingString=If(DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,Days) = _selectedStart || DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,Days) =_selectedEnd,
    Calendar.PrimaryColor,
    DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,Days) > _selectedStart && DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,Days) < _selectedEnd,
    LightBlue,
DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,Days) =_today, 
    RGBA(0,0,0,0.1), 
// default
    RGBA(0,0,0,0)); NameMapSourceSchema=?; IsLockable=False; AFDDataSourceName=}

@{InvariantPropertyName=Color; AutoRuleBindingEnabled=False; AutoRuleBindingString=If(DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,Days)=_selectedStart || DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,Days)=_selectedEnd,
        White,
    DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,Days)=_today || Month(DateAdd(_firstDayInView,ThisItem.Value,Days))=Month(_firstDayOfMonth),
        Black,
    ColorFade(Black,60%)); NameMapSourceSchema=?; IsLockable=False; AFDDataSourceName=}

Children.Name: icnEvent

Rules.InvariantScript:
With(
    {Interval: 15},
    ForAll(
        Sequence(60 * 24 / Interval),
        Time(
            0,
            Interval * (Value - 1),
            0
        )
    )
)
